shrine.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a place that is connected with a holy event or holy person, and that people visit to pray
shrine.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: his pilgrimage to the shrine of St John
shrine.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a place that people visit and respect because it is connected with a famous person or event
